pkgmetadata.longdescription: Integration of Geography, Environment, and Remote Sensing // Handling and manipulation polygons, coordinates, and other geographical objects. The tools include: polygon areas, barycentric and trilinear coordinates (Hormann and Floater, 2006, doi:10.1145/1183287.1183295), convex hull for polygons (Graham and Yao, 1983, doi:10.1016/0196-6774(83)90013-5), polygon triangulation (Toussaint, 1991, doi:10.1007/BF01905693), great circle and geodesic distances, Hausdorff distance, and reduced major axis.
